Subject: Updated Clients for Ubuntu 24.04/22.04 and Fedora 40/41
Description: I'd like to request the latest client software packages for Linux. I'd like to get the latest version available for Ubuntu 22.04, Ubuntu 24.04, Fedora 40, and Fedora 41 respectively.
What_We_Know__c:
Customer would like to receive the latest EPP clients for the following OSs: 
Ubuntu 22 24 Fedora 40 41
Next_Steps__c: We have provided them all the links, so they can download the clients.
